entry.title: Crosschain
entry.summary: Hi! I am building this site to be a crosschain dex. You don't need to go through the hasle of a centralized exchange to swap your coin into other blockchains. Here you can swap Bitcoin for Litecoin, Ether for BNB, etc. This blog post is just a placeholder, but I hope to share more with you soon.
entry.content: Hi! I am building this site to be a crosschain dex. You don't need to go through the hasle of a centralized exchange to swap your coin into other blockchains. Here you can swap Bitcoin for Litecoin, Ether for BNB, etc. This blog post is just a placeholder, but I hope to share more with you soon.
